00009 long long Timer::s_startTime;

00013 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00014 Timer::Timer()
00015 {
00016   s_startTime = SDL_GetTicks();
00017   s_timeElapsed = 0.0;
00018   s_previousTickTime= s_startTime;
00019 }
00020 
00021 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00022 double Timer::getCurrentTime()
00023 {
00024   s_currentTime=SDL_GetTicks();
00025   return (s_currentTime - s_startTime)/1000.f;
00026 }
00027 
00028 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00029 void Timer::resetTimer()
00030 {
00031   s_previousTickTime = 0;
00032   s_startTime = SDL_GetTicks();
00033 }
00034 
00035 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00036 void Timer::calculateTimeElapsed()
00037 {
00038   s_currentTime = SDL_GetTicks() - s_startTime;
00039   s_timeElapsed = (s_currentTime - s_previousTickTime) / 1000.f;
00040   s_previousTickTime = s_currentTime;
00041 }
